startParkingTransaction.description: The operation cancellation has occurred due to timeout.
Currently the entry door is not reachable.
The user is blocked in Parkbee system.
All spaces are currently occupied or reserved for other customers.
Pay per minute transactions not allowed for the garage.
This garage has multiple entry doors, you need to specify the doorId.

stopParkingTransaction.description: Cannot close a transaction which is not started.
Cannot close a transaction which is not started.
